paragraph: Army of the Pharaohs (most commonly abbreviated as AOTP or A.O.T.P.) is a hip hop supergroup originating from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, formed by Jedi Mind Tricks MC Vinnie Paz in 1998. The group has strong links to other underground groups such as; OuterSpace, Demigodz, Snowgoons, La Coka Nostra, JuJu Mob, Official Pistol Gang, and Jedi Mind Tricks. It has changed several times ever since its formation.
